original_text: When your fear cometh as desolation, and your destruction cometh as a whirlwind; when distress and anguish cometh upon you.
korean_text: 너희의 두려움이 광풍 같이 임하겠고 너희의 재앙이 폭풍 같이 이르겠고 너희에게 근심과 슬픔이 임하리니

sentences.original_text: When your fear cometh as desolation
and your destruction cometh as a whirlwind
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 멸망이 회리바람처럼 올 때에

sentences.original_text: when distress and anguish cometh upon you
